subject: how to test abstract class
msgSnippet: Hi: there is a question confuse me. I have a abstract class and it has some method which not abstract method.Now ,whether i must test it? how to test ? help
messageBody:
Hi:
there is a question confuse me. I have a abstract class and it has some method which not abstract method.Now ,whether i must test it?
how to test ? help me.
Ex:
public abstract class Parent
{
public void Dosomething1()
{
..........
}
public void Dosmoething2()
{
...........
}
abstract public void Do1();
abstract public void Do2();
}
public class Child1 extends Parent
{
.....
}
public class Child2 extends Parent
{
....
}
May I test Dosomething1 for Child1 and Child2 separate ?
best regards.

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
